name: Skull Basher
description: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description: Grants the wielder's attacks a chance to stun the target and deal bonus physical damage.
notes: Multiple instances of Skull Basher-based Bash do not stack
Does not stack with Bash of the Deep, Greater Bash, and Time Lock. If any of these are present, this ability is inactive
This ability is inactive on Clones
Ranged wielders have a lower proc chance
Does not work against wards and buildings, but works against allied units
The bonus damage is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 220 health and 1 health regeneration
10 main attack damage to Strength heroes
4.5 main attack damage to Universal heroes
